name: The Mystery Of Woolley Mountain
description: Funded on Kickstarter with backers including legend of the genre Ron Gilbert, The Mystery of Woolley Mountain is an otherworldly point-and-click adventure - filled with strange beasts, evil witches, confused automatons and wacky ropemen.
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 Processor: 1.8GHz Intel Core i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Built In
